mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_type, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer_no) values(#{noticeNo}, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriterNo})
mapper.select: select n.notice_no, n.notice_type, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_writer_no, n.notice_write_date, coalesce(m.member_name, '인사팀') as notice_writer_name from notice n left outer join member m on n.notice_writer_no = m.member_no where n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}

select count(*) from notice n left outer join member m on n.notice_writer_no = m.member_no
instr(nvl(m.member_name, '인사팀'), #{keyword}) > 0
instr(n.notice_title, #{keyword}) > 0
instr(n.notice_content, #{keyword}) > 0

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select n.notice_no, n.notice_type, n.notice_title, n.notice_writer_no, n.notice_write_date, coalesce(m.member_name, '인사팀') as notice_writer_name from notice n left outer join member m on n.notice_writer_no = m.member_no
instr(nvl(m.member_name, '인사팀'), #{keyword}) > 0
instr(n.notice_title, #{keyword}) > 0
instr(n.notice_content, #{keyword}) > 0
order by n.notice_write_date desc ) TMP where rownum
<= #{page} * #{size} ) where rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{size}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_type=#{noticeType}, notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, notice_content=#{noticeContent}, notice_write_date=systimestamp where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select attachment_no from notice_image where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
select attachment_no from notice_editor_image where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.delete: delete from notice_image where notice_no = #{noticeNo} and attachment_no = #{attachmentNo}
delete from notice_editor_image where notice_no = #{noticeNo} and attachment_no = #{attachmentNo}
